mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_name, user_pwd, user_pwd_salt, user_enabled) values (#{user.userName}, #{user.userPwd}, #{user.userPwdSalt}, #{user.userEnabled})
mapper.select: select u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pwd, u.user_pwd_salt, u.user_enabled, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.modified_time as user_modified_time from user_info as u where u.id = #{id}
